Package gg.xp.xivsupport.gui.groovy

Interface ScriptSettingsControl

public interface ScriptSettingsControl
Helper to allow scripts to request that they be startup scripts

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ScriptSettingsControl
    noop
    No-op version of this.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    requestRunOnStartup()
    To be called from within the script.

  • Field Details

    • noop

      static final ScriptSettingsControl noop
      No-op version of this. Used for testing.

  • Method Details

    • requestRunOnStartup

      void requestRunOnStartup()
      To be called from within the script. Causes the "Allow this script to run on startup?" message to appear.
